hibernate-mapping.sql-query: UPDATE TRN_BILL_MVMNT BM, (SELECT BM1.BILL_NO BN, MAX(BM1.MOVEMNT_ID) BMID FROM TRN_BILL_MVMNT BM1 WHERE BM1.BILL_NO IN (:LST_BILL_NO) GROUP BY BM1.BILL_NO ) TMP SET BM.STATUS_UPDT_DATE = :DT, BM.UPDATED_DATE = :DT, BM.UPDATED_POST_ID = :POST, BM.UPDATED_USER_ID = :USER WHERE BM.BILL_NO IN (:LST_BILL_NO) AND BM.BILL_NO = TMP.BN AND BM.MOVEMNT_ID = TMP.BMID

UPDATE TRN_BILL_MVMNT BM, (SELECT BM1.BILL_NO BN, MAX(BM1.MOVEMNT_ID) BMID FROM TRN_BILL_MVMNT BM1 WHERE BM1.BILL_NO IN (:LST_BILL_NO) GROUP BY BM1.BILL_NO ) TMP SET BM.STATUS_UPDT_DATE = :DT, BM.UPDATED_DATE = :DT, BM.UPDATED_POST_ID = :POST, BM.UPDATED_USER_ID = :USER, BM.STATUS_UPDT_POSTID = :POST, BM.STATUS_UPDT_USERID = :USER, BM.RECEIVING_USER_ID = :USER WHERE BM.BILL_NO IN (:LST_BILL_NO) AND BM.BILL_NO = TMP.BN AND BM.MOVEMNT_ID = TMP.BMID
